text:
Questions such as this should be addressed on a user-support forum.  I suggest
the php users mailing list, since this seems to be a php-specific issue.

Thanks for using Apache!
creator: slive@apache.org

text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> Questions such as this should be addressed on a user-support forum.  I suggest
> the php users mailing list, since this seems to be a php-specific issue.
> Thanks for using Apache!

i don't understand please answer more detail 
thanks!
creator: ldc5vn@gmail.com
slive@apache.org
text:
You have not provided evidence of a bug in Apache httpd, and therefore this is 
not the appropriate forum to discuss this issue.  I suggest you start here:
http://www.php.net/mailing-lists.php
